name: Extra Defense
description:
Greetings Commander,

Your mission today is to defend the TERRA 01a Space Station from the incoming enemy fighters.

The enemy will most likely try to destroy the 4 ports of this station. Defend them as best you can.

Your spaceship is the standard ESDF fighter model. As usual you can use the <UP> arrow for the thrusters, the <LEFT> and <RIGHT> arrows to rotate the ship and this particular model can utilise the <DOWN> arrow to rotate instantly on the opposite side of your forces. You can get extra boost for your ship by pressing the <Z> button.

The armament is also standard. The <SPACE> button will fire the main cannons while the <X> will fire the plasma cannon.

Remember, you can stand on top of the ports to either repair your spaceship and refill on fuel and ammo as is shown by the icons.

Good Luck Commander. We are counting on you

-- Post Jam Update--

- Added sound fx for hit counter, plasma cannon, charging and transmissions.

- When a port is destroyed the enemy fighters now are chasing you.

- When you run out of fuel the game does not end instantly.

- Plenty more to come after the stream.
